articles.title: Revisit the shopping trolley pain of Jackass in racing game Slackers: Carts Of Glory

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
“Guided by your moral compass: reflect on themes of home, loneliness and belonging through a complex, three-act story told effortlessly through three hours of video game narrative,” the press release for cat simulator Copycat told me. Morals? Daddy Karch, it’s happening again!
Read more
articles.title: Copycat forced me to refuse a dying elderly woman emotional comfort, then steal her chicken

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Lethal Company was one of last year's surprise horror hits. It was a brilliant dystopian scavenging sim in which you searched cellars for bolts while avoiding the attentions of creatures that hate being looked at, or which only move when they're not being looked at, or which look like your friends, from a distance. The developer's next game, Welcome To The Dark Place, is more about hearing. It's an "open-world, auditory text-based adventure" which mostly takes place in pitch blackness.
 
Read more
articles.title: The Lethal Company developer's next game is an open world where you can't see

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Just when you thought it was safe to go back into the Palwoods and hunt large, electric yellow animals of entirely original design whose names rhyme with "peekaboo", Nintendo and The Pokémon Company have announced that they're taking Palworld developers Pocketpair to court for "infringement of patent rights". 

 
Read more
articles.title: Nintendo and The Pokémon Company are suing the Palworld developers for "infringement of patent rights"

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Farm life sim snowclone My Time At X is getting a third entry. My Time At Evershine looks to feature more sowing, reaping, kissing and combat, similar to the previous games My Time At Portia and My Time At Sandrock, but with a new art style, campaign co-op and citybuilding elements. You'll get a glimpse of the new art style in the announcement trailer below.

 
Read more
articles.title: My Time At Evershine promises to bring a new art style and expanded co-op to the farming life sim

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
I don't think I'm going out on a limb by saying that Ubisoft's best game of this year won't be Star Wars Outlaws or the as-yet unreleased Assassin's Creed Shadows, it'll be Prince Of Persia: The Lost Crown. The sidescrolling metroidvania is a rich, expansive, and surprisingly challenging take on a genre typically dominated by indies, and it's precisely the kind of game I wish mega-publishers produced more.

It's also now got a story expansion, Mask Of Darkness, which came out yesterday.

 
Read more
articles.title: Prince Of Persia: The Lost Crown's story DLC Mask Of Darkness is out now

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
We don't write much about board and paper games around these parts, not since Cardboard Children was sent to the dissolving pits. I still feel that roleplay and strategy gaming has a home here on RPS even when it's not digital though, and doubly so when it's the work of our former comrades.

Enter Gold Teeth, a tabletop RPG "of piracy & occult horror" which just cleared its Kickstarter funding goal, and which is designed by Marsh Davies and Jim Rossignol (RPS in peace).

 
Read more
articles.title: Gold Teeth is a tabletop RPG about "piracy and occult horror" from RPS pals Jim Rossignol and Marsh Davies

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Yesterday I watched a Youtube video about Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, in which sundry, gesticulating milords of the internet opine that they had "forgot what it's like to be the target audience" for games, hailing the new (and for our money, fairly good) Warhammer 40K shooter as a throwback affair that "oozes masculinity", with no excess feelings or real-life social relevancy. I then combed through several thousand comments below said video, many of which expressed similar longing for the hypothetical Good Old Days, before those wily feminists invaded the medium, transformed every game into a LGBT+ weeping simulator, and threw all the Real Men into a big hole. I did this because I was searching for one particular comment written by somebody claiming to be Matthew Karch, CEO of Space Marine 2 developers Saber Interactive. 

 
Read more
articles.title: Saber won't say whether their CEO wrote this highly baity comment about games "imposing morals on gamers"

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
As I’m sure as is the curse of anyone who’s watched the entirety of Peep Show multiple times, I cannot read the name ‘Marko’ without hearing it in a nasally Australian accent, inquiring about cocaine. This is probably a disservice to the hero of colourful metroidvania Marko: Beyond Brave, who a quick goog tells me may be based on Krali Marko - a popular character in the folklore of Studio Mechka’s native Bulgaria. Folk hero or not, Marko certainly has some heroic facial hair: his moustache floweth so bountifully that it can’t be contained in his character portrait. Extremely powerful of him.
Read more
articles.title: Metroidvania Marko: Beyond Brave describes itself as "Slavic Silksong", and is out now

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
As per EA’s recent generative AI tugathon, the third game in Respawn’s action adventure Star Wars trilogy has been confirmed again to be in development. According to EA, it’ll be the “final chapter" in the now-trilogy, following 2019’s Jedi Fallen Order and 2023’s Jedi Survivor.
The existence of the game was first confirmed by Cal Kestis actor Cameron Monaghan, during an Ocala Comic Con panel. “We’re working on a third and we’re in the process of doing that right now,” said Monaghan, which is about as straightforward an affirmative as one could want. It was also double-confirmed this February, following news of layoffs at EA, via Eurogamer.
Read more
articles.title: EA confirm that Respawn’s next Star Wars Jedi game will be the series’ “final chapter”

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
The upcoming skate. game now has an (admittedly vague) early access release date of 2025, according to a post by the developers on Xitter. It's difficult to write about the new skate. game because if you choose to write skate. with the imposed stylings which skate. publishers Electronic Arts insist, you end up putting a full stop after every instance of skate., which makes your sentences about skate. sound fucking stupid. and. belaboured. with. pauses. Game makers, please stop putting punctuation in your game names.
Read more
articles.title: Skate heelflips into my calendar with an early access release some time in 2025

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
People waiting impatiently for The Sims 5: you have sinned against Simming and must do penance. In your temerity and ignorance, you have cried out unto developers Maxis and publisher EA for another sequential helping of the cuddly/sociopathic neighbourhood-building game - a "sequel", if you will. Know ye not that we live in the time of Disrupted Models? Sequels are archaisms devised by the old gods in their dotage. Let us all join hands and set forth into the sunny uplands of the Connected Cross-Media Cross-Platform Universe.
 
Read more
articles.title: There shall be no Sims 5, you insolent fools, only a Sims universe

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Having gone to bed last night with Final Fantasy XVI installed yet unplayed on a Steam Deck, I awoke to find Valve have slapped the moody RPG with Unsupported status for the handheld. Its crime: an inability to "run well" on the Steam Deck’s internals, regardless of settings changes. Dammit, Clive.
Read more
articles.title: Final Fantasy XVI’s wobbly Steam Deck performance gets it a failing grade from Valve

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
What are you LYMBUS? In what vat were you grown? I feel like I’ve sluggishly ambled my way down to the fridge and tried to scoop a gherkin from the jar, only to find a disconcertingly tasty sliver of my own brain - like a creature from Flatland trying to play 4D chess, and all the pieces are just tiny carvings of my face with “lol get a load of this prick” whittled into the forehead. I quite like it.
“We combined your favorite genres into one grotesque piece of software! You're welcome, game journalists,” reads the Steam page for the demo. That is a very polite way to kick me in the head and call me a bitch, LYMBUS.
Read more
articles.title: LYMBUS is hostile to my existence and keeps demanding brain cells I haven’t grown yet

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
It's been long suspected (if not officially confirmed) that the first Red Dead Redemption will be getting a PC remaster some time in the near future. We've already seen a description for the PC version appear briefly on the PlayStation store (of all places). And earlier this year a snoopy fan of the studio who monitors the backend of Rockstar's launcher found similar game descriptions buried amid metadata. Yesterday, that same practice yielded yet another clue - the game's Steam app number.
Read more
articles.title: Rockstar leak more clues of a Red Dead Redemption PC remaster

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Last month, Helldivers 2 studio Arrowhead thrust a white flag out from their shelled position in an attempt to placate mutinous fans of the co-op shooter. In response to a community sentiment best summed up by a popular Reddit post titled “Let the super earth burn”, Arrowhead released a statement. “In short, we didn’t hit our target with the latest update…what matters most now is action. Not talk.” Said action (which, it must be pointed out, felt a bit troublingly reactive to the loudest and most histrionic voices in the roo..uh, subreddit) was foreshadowed in a list of issues to be tackled over the coming months.
Read more
articles.title: You're now much stronger against tanks and armour in Helldivers 2, as Arrowhead patch for "more versatile" tactics

articles.author: Sin Vega
articles.description:
Frostpunk 2 was an ambitious gambit. With survival achieved, and the introduction's excellently sinister advisor whispering evil Tory ideas, the whole city you built in Frostpunk is now just the headquarters for a sprawling expansion effort, and your rule is no longer absolute. Rather than retread the same "prepare for ultra-Winter" ground, your biggest obstacle will likely be your own people, now formed into shifting political parties, and looking outward with colonial eyes. The result is a complicated, laborious survival citybuilder that's two parts compelling, and one part frustrating for the wrong reasons.
Read more
articles.title: Frostpunk 2 review: I became a dictator because everyone was so goddamn annoying

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
As the end of the UK workday approaches, and the last few grains of sand trickle through the neck of the huge, obsidian hourglass our overlord Graham keeps on his desk, let me bid you goodbye by writing up Some Goodbyes We Made. 
Read more
articles.title: Some Goodbyes We Made is a collection of sorrowfully sweet games about saying goodbye

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
I really wanted to like action adventure The Plucky Squire more than I do now, having given its charming 2D to 3D platforming a proper whirl. Yes, it's lovely to look at. Yes, hopping out of a storybook and making friends with an illustration on a coffee mug is cool. And yes, everyone can have a mildly fun time with its puzzles and fights. But that's the problem: who is everyone? At first I thought, "This game is for young kids and that's fine!", given its relative simplicity. Then I hit some puzzles and thought, "Ain't no kid figuring this out".
Then it hit me. It struggles to balance the fine line between being approachable for tiny tots and layered enough for people who've graduated from "goo goo ga ga" to "oo oo aa aa my back hurts". And that's down to how plucky you're allowed to squire at any given time, because it can be surprisingly limited and, sadly, a bit underwhelming.
Read more
articles.title: The Plucky Squire review: a charming storybook adventure, but I wish it let you go full plucko mode

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
You can't travel back to the 1980s. But what if I told you it was possible to gently warp your memories of that time? UFO 50 is a kart of 50 games that once existed for an old computer system, all lovingly restored by a gang of coders. The old console, of course, is a fiction. The LX-I never existed. But it's a fun pseudo-history against which to create a grab bag of small games (some throwaway, others mighty) all designed with a distinct 80s look. It's an exercise in adhering to an aesthetic. Like an oil painter working with a limited range of colours, the developers of this bundle have stuck to a 32-colour equivalent of the Zorn palette. Yet play a little of each game, and you start to sense the smirk of chronos. These games aren't stuck in the past, but they are enjoying a holiday there. 
Read more
articles.title: UFO 50 review: a pixellated portrait of the 1980s that offers a strange sort of time travel

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Having played the opening hour of Altus’ Metaphor: ReFantazio – now mere weeks away from its October 11th launch – I think it’s high time to correct a games previewing injustice. Namely, that the majority of its pre-release buzz has centred around its proximity to Persona, and not its far more entertaining quality of having the most gleefully bizarre RPG enemy design this side of Elden Ring’s horn-tooting orbpeople.
Read more
articles.title: Metaphor: ReFantazio almost has me sold on its bonkers bad guy designs alone

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Why is every blockbuster video game now some kind of live service game? Speaking as a clueless idiot, the explanation I find most convincing is that it's an attempt to bridge the gap between the returns publishers want from video games, versus how much we're able or willing to pay upfront. "Triple-A" projects now cost exorbitant sums to develop, partly thanks to wider economic inflation, but also because publishers have spent decades teaching players that every sequel has to be More and Shinier. Premium game prices have not risen in proportion, and investors want growth, as they do.
Live service games sneak around this difficulty by dragging out the time we spend playing them. Whether premium or free-to-play, they seek to install themselves as habits by means of regular, planned updates and additions. This is time that can be monetised by way of a subscription model, time in which other products may be sold to you, like skins and paintjobs, and time that becomes a commodity in itself, "engagement", which can be transmuted and exploited to various end. I'm not sure it's ever been expressed this way in any press release boast about longevity, but the unspoken principle/logical extrapolation seems to be that ideally, a live service game should keep us plugged in and plugging away till we die.
 Read more
articles.title: We should redefine live service games as the living dead

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Týden v KDE jako téměř definitivní finiš závodu o Plasmu 6.2, AMD a Dell i Framework chtějí zlepšit běhu FreeBSD na noteboocích, energetická efektivita Xeonů Granite Rapids otestována.
articles.title: Asynchronní vypínání v Linuxu 6.12 nebude, FreeBSD poběží lépe na noteboocích

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Ve světě PC máme jediného výrobce CPU, který stojí za řeč a jediného výrobce GPU, který dominuje trhu velkých hráčských karet. Křečovitě se drží jediný správný OS, zatímco jediný správný browser si poklidně kraluje.
articles.title: Pokračující monopolizace světa PC: kdo přijde další?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Satrapa)
articles.description: Typografické schopnosti webových prohlížečů zaznamenaly v uplynulých letech velký pokrok. Dnešní prohlížeče už umí věci, které byly ještě celkem nedávno vyhrazeny specializovaným programům.
articles.title: Písma na webu: rodina je základ písma

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Dokončíme popis blokových a řetězcových instrukcí, které jsou specifickým rysem instrukční sady Intel 8086/8088. Ukážeme si vliv směru přenosu dat a zaměříme se i na problematiku rychlosti provádění blokových operací.
articles.title: Specifika instrukční sady mikroprocesorů Intel 8086/8088 (3)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Václav Dvorský)
articles.description: Je mi jasné, že titulek může vypadat kontroverzně, ale věřte mi, myslím to úplně vážně. Před nějakým časem by to vypadalo jako nesmysl, nicméně doba se změnila. Právě o tom je tento článek.
articles.title: Stavíme herní počítač na Linuxu pro moderní hraní

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Sonda do světa otevřeného softwaru. Dnes si představíme open-source konkurenta Cursoru, řekneme si o správci hesel pro GNOME, vyzkoušíme svobodný fork již nesvobodného Redisu a podíváme se na terminál pro kontejnery.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (25. 9. 2024)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Dnes si ukážeme, jak vytvořit neuronovou síť s volitelným počtem skrytých vrstev, naučit tuto síť řešit zvolený problém s využitím sady trénovacích dat a následně tuto síť použít nad další sadou (validačních) dat.
articles.title: Neuronové sítě v knihovně scikit-learn: vytvoření a učení malé sítě

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: CESNET CERTS)
articles.description: V dnešním díle Postřehů hrají v hlavních rolích neopatrné parsování XML souborů, VMware a jeho zranitelnosti či změny v zabezpečení přístrojů s Androidem. Nakonec budeme loupat cibuli – Tor.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: loupeme Tor s německou policií

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Tým AlmaLinux oznámil založení nové zájmové skupiny, která se bude zabývat certifikací hardwaru. Fedora 42 možná přejde na nový instalátor s webovým rozhraním. Stefano Marinelli zveřejnil návod, jak udělat operační systém NetBSD neměnným.
articles.title: AlmaLinux nabízí certifikaci hardwaru, Fedora 42 s webovým instalátorem

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Týden v KDE ve znamení čištění kódu pro budoucí verzi Plasmy 6.2(.1) a novinek pro Plasmu 6.3, SDL nově preferuje API Vulkan i na Windows místo Direct3D 12, vývojová verze Wine 9.18 řeší 18 chyb.
articles.title: Qualcomm chce koupit Intel, KDE čistí kód příští verze Plasmy

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: johny)
articles.description:
Java 23 predstavila možnosť importu modulov. Java organizuje kód do balíčkov, ktoré je potom možné spájať do modulov. Tieto moduly môžeme najnovšie tiež importovať pomocou import príkazu.
Novinku popisuje dokument JEP 476: Module Import Declarations (Preview).
articles.title: Import modulov v Jave

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: HP v úterý představilo AI pomocníka při tisku s názvem Perfect Output. Jde o automatickou úpravu tištěných tabulek nebo webových stránek, které se typicky velmi špatně tisknou.
articles.title: HP představilo AI pomocníka při tisku

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Elastic Stack (drive ELK) je sada nastrojů na komplexní spravu logu. Na školení Elastic Stack Log Management se seznámíne s Elastic Stackem, ukážeme jak jej nainstalovat a spravovat. Naučíme se jak do něj dostat logy, jak v nich vyhledávat a jak tvořit dashboardy a alerty.
articles.title: Elastic Stack Log Management: spravujte logy pořádně (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Americký institut standardů a technologie (NIST) vydal na konci srpna návrh nových pravidel pro digitální identitu (Digital Identity Guidelines). Ta budou závazná pro americké federální úřady a spolupracující firmy. Většinou však doporučení NIST přebírají i další subjekty.
articles.title: NIST ruší některá pravidla pro hesla, která jsou kontraproduktivní

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Včera jsme psali o tom, že Simone Margaritelli objevil vážnou zranitelnost z jedné z linuxových komponent. Podrobnosti se měly objevit až v říjnu, ale informace začaly prosakovat, takže se rozhodl vše zveřejnit dříve. Ukázalo se, že jde o zranitelnost v tiskovém subsystému CUPS, který dovoluje vzdáleně spustit útočníkův kód.
articles.title: Zranitelnost v CUPS umožňuje vzdálené spuštění kódu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři uvolnili očekávaný PostgreSQL 17 s řadou vylepšení a nových funkcí. Detaily jsme popisovali už v květnu v článku PostgreSQL 17: pádící slon nezpomalí. Mezi hlavní novinky patří nový systém správy paměti pro VACUUM, který snižuje spotřebu paměti a může zlepšit celkový výkon vysávání.
articles.title: PostgreSQL 17 zlepšuje výkon při čtení i zápisech

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Novou kritickou zranitelnost linuxových systémů objevil a nahlásil Simone Margaritelli, odborník na počítačovou bezpečnost s přezdívkou EvilSocket. Společnosti Canonical a Red Hat už problém potvrdily a ohodnotily jeho nebezpečnost na 9,9 z 10 na stupnici závažnosti CVSS. Doplněno: Jde o řadu bezpečnostních chyb v tiskovém subsystému CUPS.
articles.title: Kritická zranitelnost linuxových systémů dostala hodnocení CVSS 9.9, oprava zatím neexistuje

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Projekt Vanilla OS zveřejnil příspěvek na blogu, ve kterém odpovídá na otázky, které uživatelé vznesli po vydání Vanilla OS 2. Příspěvek obsahuje informace o plánech aktualizace systému, podnikové verzi s podporou a chystané experimentální verzi nazvané Vanilla OS Vision.
articles.title: Vanilla OS: plány, aktualizace a další verze

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Google tvrdí, že přechod na jazyky bezpečné pro paměť, jako je Rust, v rámci přístupu secure-by-design, vedl ke snížení zranitelností paměti v Androidu během šesti let ze 76 % na 24 % ze všech objevených zranitelností. Tato změna u nových funkcí nejen snižuje celkové bezpečnostní riziko, ale také umožňuje „škálovatelnější a nákladově efektivnější“ přechod.
articles.title: Přechod Androidu na Rust snížil počet zranitelností paměti za pět let na pětinu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Pokud vás zajímá decentralizovaná sociální síť Mastodon a lidé na ní, můžete se přidat ke druhému ročníku srazu uživatelů, který se bude konat v pátek 11. října 2024 od 17:30 v Praze v Hospůdce Do Větru (Na Větrníku 1930/1, Praha 6 – Břevnov). Můžete dorazit, ať už jste ve Fediverse nováček, nebo veterán.
articles.title: Druhý ročník srazu uživatelů Mastodon a Fediverse

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vídeňská nezisková organizace Noyb (zkratka pro None Of Your Business) podala u rakouského úřadu pro ochranu osobních údajů (DPA) stížnost na tvůrce prohlížeče Firefox za to, že nasadil novou funkci nazvanou Privacy-Preserving Attribution (PPA), aniž by výslovně požádal uživatele o souhlas.
articles.title: Stížnost na Mozillu kvůli povolení sledování ve Firefoxu bez souhlasu uživatele

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Režisér Danny Boyle je znám experimentováním. Už první díl, 28 Days Later byl v roce 2002 natáčen primárně pomocí běžné 3CCD MiniDV kamery Canon XL-1, uvedené na trh v roce 1998, tedy v kvalitě odpovídající 480p (konkrétně 525 řádků, 60 Hz). To filmu propůjčilo unikátní punc už tehdy, natož optikou dnešní 8k doby.
articles.title: Danny Boyle točí 28 Years Later s iPhone 15 Pro Max

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Nová verze linuxového nástroje pro aktualizaci firmwarů Fwupd 1.9.25 přináší další dílčí rozšíření podporovaných zařízení. Kromě toho tvůrci zapracovali na snížení spotřeby v klidu pro spárovaná zařízení typu Logitech HID++ a dalších opravách (kontrola velikosti firmwaru pro Synaptics MST, podpora retry operace u NVMe zařízení typu Hynix BC901, …).
articles.title: Fwupd 1.9.25 přidává podporu Intel USB4 hubu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Intel vydal novou generaci Xeonů Granite Rapids poodhalenou na konci léta a Phoronix rovnou přináší úvodní test 128jádrového modelu Xeon 6980P. Ve stručnosti shrnuje, že jej Intel s Granite Rapids (pozitivně) překvapil. Test přitom proběhl na referenční platformě dodané Intelem, s rychlými pamětmi MRDIMM-8800 (Multiplexed Rank DIMM).
articles.title: Intel Xeon Granite Rapids v prvních testech na Linuxu poráží AMD, ale ne nadlouho

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Švýcarsko učinilo významný krok k otevření svého software svým Federálním zákonem o používání elektronických prostředků pro plnění úkolů veřejné správy (EMBAG). Tento průlomový právní předpis nařizuje zveřejňování zdrojového kódu pro software vyvinutý pro vládní účely.
articles.title: Švýcarská federální vláda vyžaduje uvolnění zdrojových kódu u svého softwaru

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Kubernetes je dnes nejrozšířenější platformou na hostovaní Docker kontejnerů a je podporován velkými hráči na trhu (Google, Amazon, Microsoft) skrz Cloud Native Computing Foundation. Kuberneres pro provoz používají všechny velikosti firem, od startupu po korporace. Pojďme se naučit jej používat na dvoudenním kurzu Úvod do Kubernetes, který proběhne v naší pražské školicí místnosti ve dnech 14. a 15. října. Školení proběhne pouze online.
articles.title: Naučte se Kubernetes na našem dvoudenním školení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: V květnu Winamp oznámil, že otevře zdrojové kódy legendárního multimediálního přehrávače. Nyní se tak skutečně stalo a zdrojové kódy byly uvolněny na GitHubu. Winamp na svém oficiálním kanále na síti X říká, že uživatelé mají nyní možnost ovlivnit budoucnost svého oblíbeného přehrávače.  Zkoumejte, upravujte a rozvíjejte klasiku, kterou znáte a máte rádi.
articles.title: Winamp zveřejnil zdrojové kódy, ale pod podivnou licencí v rozporu s pravidly GitHubu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Po několika týdnech testování vydal Valve novou verzi balíku Proton, jím upraveného projektu Wine do snadno použitelné podoby integrované do Steamu. Mezi nově podporované hry se zařazují tituly jako Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora, Flatout 3, Syberia, Unity of Command II, Sleeping Dogs: Definitive Edition či Zaccaria Pinball.
articles.title: Valve Proton 9.0-3 přidává podporu nových her, opravuje desítky chyb

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Jak bylo před něolika dny avizováno, nyní se děje. Procesory Intel se už nebudou na Linuxu všechny tvářit jako příslušníci „Family 6“, rodiny sahající až do 90. let minulého století, první takovou bude architektura Diamond Rapids, která bude známa též jako „Family 19“.
articles.title: Intel Diamond Rapids už bude Family 19

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Projekt OpenZFS zařadil do kódu podporu Direct I/O (O_DIRECT) pro souborový systém ZFS, aby se při čtení a zápisu obešel ARC. Na zařazení kódu se čekalo od roku 2020, kdy byl vytvořen původní pull request.
articles.title: OpenZFS přidává podporu pro Direct I/O

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Po téměř 12 letech vývoje byla vydána verze 1.0.0 programovacího jazyka Hy, což je dialekt jazyka Lisp, který je zabudován do jazyka Python. Jedná se o první stabilní vydání tohoto jazyka. Čerstvě vydaná verze 1.0.0 podporuje Python 3.8 až 3.13. Proč jej používat, se dozvíte v dokumentaci a na stránce „Proč Hy?“.
articles.title: Hy 1.0.0: dialekt Lispu integrovaný do Pythonu

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Generální ředitel společnosti Pavel Durov oznámil aktualizaci pravidel. Telegram vyhoví žádostem orgánů činných v trestním řízení, pokud se zjistí, že vyšetřovaný uživatel porušuje pravidla platformy. V takových případech pak bude Telegram poskytovat údaje uživatelů orgánům činným v trestním řízení v reakci na platné zákonné požadavky.
articles.title: Telegram bude poskytovat údaje o uživatelích orgánům činným v trestním řízení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Mirror Hall je experimentální implementace nástroje, který dovoluje proměnit libovolné linuxové zařízení v bezdrátový externí displej. Z vysokoúrovňového pohledu jde vlastně o kombinací bezdrátového streameru videa, síťového přehrávače videa a virtuálního zobrazovače pro prostředí GNOME.
articles.title: Mirror Hall: externí bezdrátový displej z libovolného linuxového zařízení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: johny)
articles.description: Minulý týždeň v utorok  vyšla najnovšia verzia Javy: Java 23. Dokumenty JEP 476 Module Import Declarations a JEP 477 Implicitly Declared Classes and Instance Main Methods opisujú zmeny, ktoré ďalej zjednodušujú tvorbu menších programov určených na výuku a testovanie.
articles.title: Java 23 ďalej zjednodušuje písanie malých programov

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Vilém Sládek)
articles.description: Pořadatelé již osmého ročníku komunitního setkání správců nejen českých a slovenských sítí – CSNOG 2025, které se uskuteční 21. a 22. ledna, vyhlásili Call for Abstracts.
articles.title: Organizátoři síťařského setkání CSNOG 2025 vyhlásili Call for Abstracts

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Konica Minolta naučila kamery vidět dovnitř výrobků. Dokážou rozpoznat správné složení léků či potravin. Konsorcium LUMI-Q podepsalo smlouvu o zřízení kvantového počítače v ČR. Každý třetí útok ransomwaru na české firmy začíná zneužitím zranitelnosti. Přínosy AI v podnikových informačních systémech. Huawei Connect 2024: Chceme budovat infrastrukturu, která obstojí v budoucnosti. Laser změní izolant na polovodič.

articles.description: Golden: ve 2D se konečně podařilo připravit i zlato. Temná hmota mohla pomoci vytvořit supermasivní černé díry v raném vesmíru. Pozitronium ochladili téměř na absolutní nulu.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Konsorcium LUMI-Q podepsalo smlouvu o zřízení kvantového počítače v ČR

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Salesforce představuje Agentforce – AI nástroj pro budoucnost zákaznických služeb. Novinky v MSP platformě Acronis: Copilot a automatizované postupy odezvy. Třetina firem v ČR má téměř nulovou míru digitalizace. Objevili nový materiál pro opticky řízenou magnetickou paměť.

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Supravodivost: Popsali bohatý svět hydridů yttria. Supravodič zesílený magnetismem. Pro supravodivost hydridů by mohl být klíčový také cer. Dnešní podobu Sluneční soustavy mohla zformovat další hvězda.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Podařilo se vytvořit otisk zrcadel do superfotonu

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Když vidíte podobné ceny, při srovnání nákupu softwaru na oficiálních kanálech s Goodoffer24 se při tak velkém rozdílu nemůžete splést. Například u Windows 11 Pro je srovnání naprosto úžasné, protože srovnáváte částku €20 s tradiční cenou €259.

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Chytré kamery umí předejít útokům se zbraní. Útočníka odhalí i v davu. Umělá inteligence pohání rostoucí investice do cloudových služeb PaaS a IaaS. Platforma RHEL AI podpoří podnikové inovace. AI patří i na notebooky. Bezserverová architektura není všelékem.

articles.description: Zmapovali 50 000 záhadných uzlů DNA v lidském genomu. Kolik tak mohly vážit první hvězdy? Kabely pro jaderné elektrárny budou bezpečnější a vydrží déle.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Má smysl namísto života hledat ve vesmíru složitou chemii?

articles.title: Jaderné noviny – přehled za srpen 2024

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Počet uživatelů Starlink (Wikipedie) překročil 4 milióny (𝕏). Milión nových uživatelů za 4 měsíce.

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Rakudo (Wikipedie), tj. překladač programovacího jazyka Raku (Wikipedie), byl vydán ve verzi #176 (2024.09). Programovací jazyk Raku byl dříve znám pod názvem Perl 6.

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byly publikovány informace o 4 kritických bezpečnostních chybách v CUPS (Common UNIX Printing System): CVE-2024-47176, CVE-2024-47076, CVE-2024-47175 a CVE-2024-47177. Vzdálený neověřený útočník může tiše nahradit adresy IPP stávajících tiskáren (nebo nainstalovat nové) za zlovolné, což může mít za následek spuštění libovolného příkazu (RCE) při spuštění tiskové úlohy.
articles.title: 4 kritické bezpečnostní chyby v CUPS

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Tcl/Tk, tj. programovací jazyk Tcl (Tool Command Language) a související GUI toolkit Tk, bylo vydáno v nové major verzi 9.0.0. Po 27 letech od vydání 8.0.0.
articles.title: Tcl/Tk 9.0.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Mastodon CZ Sraz 2024, tj. druhý ročník srazu uživatelů Mastodonu a Fediverse proběhne 11. října 2024 v Praze.
articles.title: Mastodon CZ Sraz 2024 - Praha

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Projekty Tor a Tails se spojují. Tails bude začleněn do struktury projektu Tor pro snazší spolupráci, lepší udržitelnost, snížení režie, rozšiřování povědomí o větším počtu digitálních hrozeb a lepší ochranu před sledováním a cenzurováním.

articles.title: 2. alfa verze desktopového prostředí COSMIC Epoch 1

articles.description: Byl vydán PostgreSQL 17. Přehled novinek v poznámkách k vydání.

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Společnost Meta Platforms na své dvoudenní konferenci Meta Connect 2024 představuje novinky: brýle Orion (původně Project Nazare) pro rozšířenou realitu (AR, Augmented Reality), nový VR headset Meta Quest 3S, vylepšené chytré brýle Ray-Ban Meta nebo Llama 3.2, tj. nejnovější verzi svého velkého jazykového modelu.

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Počítačová hra XBill (Wikipedie) oslavila v létě 30 let. V devadesátkách Linuxáci poctivě bránili Billovi v instalaci Windows. Bohužel hry XSteve a XSatya nevznikly. A nemáme ani hru XTim. Proto není Linux na desktopu tak rozšířený ☺. Mimochodem, po 25 letech byl aktualizován XBill pro PalmOS.
articles.title: XBill oslavil 30 let

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Taking place this week in Berlin was systemd's annual "All Systems Go" developer conference. Among the interesting talks was Lennart Poettering talking about the ongoing challenges of D-Bus for inter-process communication (IPC) with systemd and how they are looking at Varlink for IPC needs moving forward...
articles.title: Systemd Looking At A Future With More Varlink & Less D-Bus For IPC

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The KVM x86/x86_64 changes were merged today as we are nearly done with the Linux 6.12 merge window...
articles.title: KVM With Linux 6.12 Will Advertise AVX10.1 Support To Guest VMs

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Following AMD and FreeBSD Foundation collaborations and the Sovereign Tech Fund making a big investment into FreeBSD, the FreeBSD Foundation and Quantum Leap Research have announced a $750,000 USD commitment to improve laptop support on this BSD operating system with backing by Dell, AMD, and Framework Computer...
articles.title: FreeBSD To See Better Laptop Support With Investment Backed By AMD, Dell & Framework

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: File-systems in user-space continue to become more robust with the latest FUSE updates merged for Linux 6.12...
articles.title: FUSE In Linux 6.12 Adds Idmapped Mounts & Writeback Optimization

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: It's been a busy week for Valve Linux graphics software engineer Mike Blumenkrantz. Besides hacking on Mesa's Zink OpenGL-on-Vulkan driver implementation, this week his latest target was working to help accelerate the pace of Wayland protocol development. He's been working through a few proposals like addressing NACK usage for how Wayland protocols can be rejected and in ending out the week he has drafted some additional workflow improvements...
articles.title: Blumenkrantz Proposes Workflow Improvements For Wayland Protocols

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The LoongArch architecture support for these Chinese processors continue seeing better support with the upstream Linux kernel...
articles.title: LoongArch Adds ACPI BGRT Support & Other Improvements For Linux 6.12

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Ahead of the Linux 6.12 merge window wrapping up this weekend with the Linux 6.12-rc1 release, merged on Friday were all of the Compute Express Link (CXL) updates for the new kernel...
articles.title: More CXL Additions Arrive For Linux 6.12

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: KDE developers remain very busy landing bug and crash fixes ahead of the upcoming Plasma 6.2 desktop release...
articles.title: KDE Sees Many Crash Fixes & Other Improvements Ahead Of Plasma 6.2

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Valve's SteamOS is built atop Arch Linux and now the company is further helping the upstream Linux distribution by collaborating with resources to help with build service infrastructure and a secure signing enclave...
articles.title: Valve Helping Arch Linux With Build Service Infrastructure & Secure Signing Enclave

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: If you wanted to get in on the last Phoronix Premium promotion before the end-of-year holidays, this is your last chance to do so with the "Oktoberfest" sale ending this weekend for helping to support the site while enjoying ad-free browsing, native dark mode, multi-page articles on a single page, and other benefits...
articles.title: Last Call For The 2024 Phoronix Premium Oktoberfest Promotion

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: It's been just one week since the release of ROCm 6.2.1 while today ROCm 6.2.2 was released...
articles.title: AMD ROCm 6.2.2 Released To Fix Instinct MI300X Error Recovery Failure

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The input subsystem updates merged this week bring a number of improvements to existing drivers while adding one new input driver...
articles.title: Linux 6.12 Adds Driver For PixArt PS/2 Touchpad Found In Some Laptops

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: AMD today announced "AMD-135M" as their first small language model they are publicly releasing. AMD-135M is open-source with the training code, dataset, and weights all being open-source to help in the development of other SLMs and LLMs...
articles.title: AMD Releases AMD-135M: An Open-Source Small Language Model

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: With the Linux 6.12 merge window wrapping up this weekend and the bulk of the new feature merges now in the tree, I've begun running some Linux 6.12 benchmarks. Here is an initial look at Linux 6.10 vs. 6.11 vs. 6.12 Git on an AMD Ryzen 9 9950X desktop...
articles.title: Early Linux 6.12 Kernel Benchmarks Showing Some Nice Gains On AMD Zen 5

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Similar to the ACPI CPUFreq and AMD/Intel P-State CPU frequency scaling driver and scaling governor benchmarks and power efficiency comparisons I routinely do on Phoronix, when recently having the Supermicro AmpereOne server in the lab with the 192-core A192-32X processor, I carried out some CPPC CPUFreq schedutil vs. performance governor benchmarks for curiosity and reference purposes while looking at the performance and power efficiency...
articles.title: AmpereOne CPPC CPUFreq Schedutil vs. Performance Governor Benchmarks

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Intel software engineers have released version 0.7 of Open PGL, their open-source Path Guiding Library (PGL) that can be used by 3D renderers to enjoy state-of-the-art path guiding methods for better sampling quality and efficiency...
articles.title: Intel's Open PGL v0.7 Delivers New Experimental Features

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Apache CouchDB 3.4.1 was released today after the developers decided at the last minute before releasing CouchDB 3.4 to drop automatic upgrading of password hashes... Thus CouchDB 3.4.1 is out as the big "CouchDB 3.4" release. The CouchDB 3.4 series brings a number of performance improvements, QuickJS as an alternative to the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine, and other enhancements...
articles.title: CouchDB Update Brings QuickJS Engine Option - 4~5x Faster Than SpiderMonkey

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Patches for wiring up async device shutdown within the Linux kernel were queued via the driver core branch for the in-development Linux 6.12 kernel. However, at the last minute these asynchronous device shutdown patches were reverted so that they can be reworked and hopefully land for the Linux v6.13 kernel in the new year...
articles.title: Asynchronous Device Shutdown Doesn't Make It For Linux 6.12

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Sound Open Firmware 2.11 is now available for this open-source audio DSP firmware infrastructure and SDK project backed by Intel, AMD, and other IHVs/ISVs. With SOF 2.11 comes support for new hardware from both AMD and Intel...
articles.title: Sound Open Firmware 2.11 Adds AMD ACP 7.0 Strix Point & Intel Panther Lake Support

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The upstream Linux 6.11 kernel introduced the ability to easily produce a Pacman kernel package for Arch Linux with the new "make pacman-pkg" target. With Linux 6.12 new additions to the Kbuild code make it easy to also produce a debug kernel build for Arch Linux systems...
articles.title: Upstream Linux 6.12 Makes It Easier To Build A Debug Kernel For Arch Linux

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: As part of his new hope for helping to accelerate Wayland protocol development, Mike Blumenkrantz with Valve proposed an "experimental" protocol development area within Wayland-Protocols. He's also laid out a proposal for seeking to solidify the means by which suggested protocol changes can be rejected...
articles.title: Blumenkrantz Seeks Clear Policy How Wayland Protocol Changes Can Be Rejected

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: BusyBox 1.37 has been released as the first feature release in one and a half years for this "Swiss Army Knife of embedded Linux" systems.  With BusyBox 1.37 comes some new options, many fixes, and other enhancements...
articles.title: BusyBox 1.37 Adds "getfattr" Along With Other Improvements

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: There's been much speculation since this morning over a reported "severe" unauthenticated remote code execution (RCE) flaw affecting Linux systems that carries a CVSS 9.9.9 score... The embargo has now lifted with the details on this nasty issue...
articles.title: Unauthenticated RCE Flaw With CVSS 9.9 Rating For Linux Systems Affects CUPS

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Earlier this week in the launch-day Intel Xeon 6980P Granite Rapids review/benchmarks I unfortunately wasn't able to provide any CPU power consumption and performance-per-Watt benchmarks due a Linux kernel issue and the minimal time ahead of launch for testing. I've now repeated the Xeon 6980P benchmarking on the Linux 6.8 kernel of Ubuntu 24.04 LTS with power monitoring working and have those power efficiency numbers to share today for how Granite Rapids compares to prior Emerald Rapids / Sapphire Rapids / Ice Lake and against the current AMD EPYC Bergamo/Genoa(X) competition.
articles.title: Intel Xeon 6980P vs. AMD EPYC Power Efficiency / Performance-Per-Watt Benchmarks

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: PostgreSQL 17 is out today as the newest annual feature release to this widely-used SQL database server. Notable with PostgreSQL 17 is having an AVX-512 optimized bit_count function along with several other heavy hitting performance optimizations...
articles.title: PostgreSQL 17 Released With AVX-512 Optimization & Up To 2x Better Write Throughput

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Following the release of the COSMIC Alpha desktop in early August, System76 is closing out September by issuing the second alpha release of their Rust-based open-source desktop environment...
articles.title: System76 Releases COSMIC Alpha 2 Desktop Packages

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The USB/Thunderbolt subsystem updates were submitted today for the Linux 6.12 kernel merge window along with the other areas of the kernel overseen by Greg Kroah-Hartman. A new USB driver is the 9p network gadget driver that has been in development for quite a while and aims to help ease embedded Linux device development...
articles.title: Linux 6.12 Brings 9p Network USB Gadget Driver To Ease Embedded Device Development

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The RISC-V architecture updates have been submitted for the Linux 6.12 kernel cycle. More RISC-V CPU ISA extensions are being supported along with enabling some additional kernel features for this CPU architecture...
articles.title: RISC-V Wires Up More Kernel Features With Linux 6.12

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: The VirtIO Vsock guest/host communication interface using virtual sockets will see better performance with the in-development Linux 6.12 kernel...
articles.title: VirtIO Vsock Performance To Improve With Linux 6.12

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: It's been nearly three months since the last DXVK release for this Direct3D 8 / 9 / 10 / 11 implementation built atop Vulkan for Steam Play (Proton) / Wine. That changed today with  Philip Rebohle having just released DXVK 2.4.1...
articles.title: DXVK 2.4.1 Released With Many Improvements, More Robust Direct3D 8

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Vulkan 1.3.296 is out as the first spec update in nearly one month. Given the time that has passed there are more bug fixes than usual but there is also a prominent new extension: VK_EXT_device_generated_commands...
articles.title: Vulkan 1.3.296 Released With VK_EXT_device_generated_commands

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: With the Intel Xeon 6900P "Granite Rapids" launch today the review embargo has now expired. I began with my Intel Granite Rapids Linux benchmarking a few days ago and have initial benchmarks to share for the flagship Xeon 6980P processors paired with MRDIMM 8800MT/s memory. This is just the beginning of a lot of Granite Rapids benchmarks to come on Phoronix. Compared to the existing AMD EPYC competition and prior generation Intel Xeon processors, the Xeon 6900P series performance surpassed my expectations and has debuted as an incredibly strong performer. In some areas of HPC and other workloads, Intel is able to regain leadership performance with Granite Rapids paired with MRDIMMs. In AI workloads where the software is optimized for AMX, the new Xeon 6900P CPUs can showcase staggering leads.
articles.title: Intel Xeon 6980P "Granite Rapids" Linux Benchmarks
Beamsplitters
Late Cenozoic
Physics Lab Thermostat
Maslow's Pyramid

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
With the Tokyo Game Show 2024 coming to an end, Naoki Yoshida and Toshio Murouchi have sat down and provided viewers around the world with the first sneak peak of what’s to come in Final Fantasy XIV's patch 7.1. 


We now have a name for the patch, Crossroads, and as usual there are more MSQ quests and a new dungeon, Yuweyawata Field Station, to be completed. With its release planned for “mid-November”, Crossroads is jam-packed with new content and features, so without further ado, let’s dive into today’s reveals. 


Note: The stream was in Japanese only, and information here comes from presentation slides (which were thankfully translated) and live translations provided by Miuna in the FFXIV Official Discord server. 


Echoes of Vana’diel details revealed


Revealing that he has undertake…
articles.title: FFXIV patch 7.1: Crossroads coming in November, including new Chaotic Alliance Raid, improved Hall of the Novice, and more

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
In EA FC 25, changing the camera angles isn't just about making the gameplay look good.


Like every game that requires skill, there's a competitive side of things with the latest football game. While EA Sports offers you several choices to pick from, some camera angles are simply better than the rest. They allow you to view bigger areas on the field, which lets you have more information at any given time. But before settling down on the best settings, it's essential to learn to make the changes in the first place.


How to change the camera in EA FC 25


When you start playing for the first time, the camera is set to Tactical. I am not a fan of this particular angle. It wasn't good last year; the same can be said for this year. To change that, complete the following steps.



Load up the …
articles.title: How to change camera angles in EA FC 25

articles.description:

The RTTK promo marks the beginning of a new year for EA FC 25 Ultimate Team, and you can find these special cards in packs, SBCs, and objectives.


Like the previous few years, the promo is once again based around four different European club competitions. All the items have the potential to be upgraded to three levels in the future, but some of the cards are simply better than the rest.


I have ranked the cards based on a combination of multiple factors. While their starting overalls have a significant weightage on the rankings, elements like playstyles, roles, and chances for upgrades have also been considered.


Disclaimer: List to be updates as new cards are released in Ultimate Team. 


EA FC 25 RTTK promo S-tier cards


The S-tier includes the elite items, and you should thank your lucky stars if you manage to pack one of these cards from packs. 



Jude Bellingham

Jeremy Doku



EA FC 25 RTTK promo A-tier cards


The A-tier items are pretty good, but they're just slightly off the top from being elite tier. 



Cristian Romero


Ollie Watkins


Federico Dimarco

Ryan Cherki


Diogo Jota



EA FC 25 RTTK promo B-tier cards


Some of these items will badly need a few upgrades in the upcoming weeks to ensure that they remain viable in the meta. 



Benjamin Sesko


Noa Lang


Donny Van de Beek

EA FC 25 RTTK promo C-tier cards

After reaching the maximum level in both of your classes, the only thing left to upgrade is your Prism. Similar to your classes, Prisms gain a portion of your total experience, and once enough has been earned, you'll receive an in-game notification to level it up. At this point, you’ll be able to choose from three randomly selected stats to enhance your Prism. These stat boosts are permanent and directly apply to your character. articles.author: Zeeshan Khan
articles.description:
Project Mugetsu is a Roblox game inspired by the anime and manga series Bleach. If you’re a Bleach fan, you’ve probably heard the term “Bankai.” If not, it’s basically the ultimate attack of a Soul Reaper in the series. Since the game revolves around that concept, unlocking Bankai is key to maximizing your character's potential.


To help you out, we’ve put together a guide on how to unlock Bankai in Project Mugetsu.


What is the Meditation Level in Project Mugetsu?


Screenshot by Destructoid


Before we jump in, let’s chat about the Meditation Level. Each player has a specific Meditation Level that goes up when you enter Meditation Mode. You’ll get some key bindings to press, and every correct press earns you one Meditation EXP. But watch out—hit the wrong key, and you’ll lose ten Meditation EXP. If you want to speed things up, using the x2 Mastery can help you double your gains.


How to get Bankai in Project Mugetsu


To unlock Bankai, you’ll need to reach a meditation level of 75 if you’re not in the Urahara Clan. If you are in that clan, you can unlock Bankai at level 50. Just keep in mind that there’s one requirement for all clans: you need to be at player level 40. So, beginners won’t be able to unlock Bankai right off the bat.


Once you hit those levels, you’ll have to win a battle against your Zanpakuto to finally unlock your Bankai.


All the Bankai in Project Mugetsu


There are seven Bankais in this game. Here’s the list:



Tensa Zangetsu


Zanka No Tachi


Nozarashi


Minazuki


Kamishini No Yari


Senbonzakura Kageyoshi


Daiguren Hyorinmaru


The post How to get Bankai in Project Mugetsu appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get Bankai in Project Mugetsu

articles.author: Drew Kopp
articles.description:
The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom's Overworld is far from the largest the series has seen, but it's still a sizable landmass that'll take some time to map out completely. Luckily, you can unlock a handy-dandy fast-travel system that will hasten your quest to seal the rifts to the Still World.


Echoes of Wisdom's Fast Travel is easy to unlock and even easier to use


Screenshot via Destructoid


You won't have to wait too long to uncover Echoes of Wisdom's fast-travel system. The game subtly points you down the path you need to go to unlock it, and it takes time to ensure you understand how useful it is. Of course, if you're rushing to get your first dungeon or scope out some fun side-quests, you might breeze by the fast-travel tutorial.


To unlock fast travel, head east along the base after you've escaped Hyrule Castle, spelunk your way through Beach Cave, and finally stop by Suthorn Town. Instead of heading north to the Suthorn Temple, keep going east until you find a green, glowing statue. This is the first of many Waypoints you'll find on your travels across Hyrule.


Once you're close enough to the statue, Tri will explain what it is and how to activate it. To activate the Waypoint, walk up to it and hit the "RZ" trigger, like when you learn a new Echo. Once you've lit the Waypoint, you can activate it anytime by opening the map with the "-" button.


Before you wander into the unknown, remember that the first waypoint you find is the only one the game highlights for you. From here on out, you’ll have to keep your eyes open and take the time to activate every Waypoint you stumble across. Trust me, you’ll need them once the side quests start piling up.

The post How to unlock fast travel in The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to unlock fast travel in The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom

articles.author: Xavier Smith
articles.description:
A majority of people in Hyrule are completely uninterested in Zelda's ability to summon objects and monsters at will. However, one resident of Hyrule Castle Town is eager to see some of the monsters you've collected. Here's how to complete the A Curious Child quest in The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom.


A Curious Child quest location


Screenshot by Destructoid


Located north of Suthorn Forest, Hyrule Castle Town sits at the center of your map. Upon entering the town, take a left to find a boy standing outside a house with an orange roof. Talking to him will initiate the A Curious Child quest.


A Curious Child quest guide


Screenshot by Destructoid


The boy wants to see a Zol, one of the first monster Echoes you can obtain. If you don't have one yet, you can find them all over Hyrule Field. Once you have a Zol, summon the monster in front of the boy to briefly satisfy his curiosity.


Next, the boy will want to see an Ignizol. This is another monster Echo that you can obtain early from the first cave directly west of Suthorn Village. You can also find a pit full of Ignizols northeast of Hyrule Ranch. Summon an Ignizol near the boy to advance to the boy's final request.


Lastly, the boy wants to see a Hydrozol. This monster can be found in the northeast corner of Hyrule near Seesyde village. Southwest of the Seesyde docks, across the water, you can find a cave containing Hydrozols.


If you summon a regular Hydrozol in front of the boy, he'll be disappointed by the monster's size. To get a giant Hydrozol, summon one in the fountain at the center of the town. Once your Hydrozol's absorbed the water and grown, pick it up and drop it in front of the boy. Your reward for all the monster wrangling is five Might Crystals.

The post How to complete A Curious Child quest in Zelda Echoes of Wisdom appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to complete A Curious Child quest in Zelda Echoes of Wisdom

articles.author: Paula Vaynshteyn
articles.description:
Accessories are incredibly useful in Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom, but you can only equip one at the start of the game. If you want to equip more, you’ll need to pay a visit to the Great Fairy, but she can seem a little hard to track down. 


Where is the Great Fairy in Zelda Echoes of Wisdom?


Screenshot by Destructoid


To find the Great Fairy, you’ll need to make your way to Lake Hylia, and then it’s time to go for a swim. The Great Fairy Shrine is located on an island in the middle of the lake.


To get to Lake Hylia, you’ll need to head east from Suthorn Prairie or north from Suthorn Forest. Otherwise, you can reach it by exiting the south gate of Hyrule Castle and heading east. 


Make sure that you activate the Waypoint outside the entrance to the Great Fairy Shrine before your first visit. This will allow you to immediately fast travel to the location for subsequent visits.


How to get more accessory slots in Zelda Echoes of Wisdom


Screenshot by Destructoid


Head into the Shrine and make sure to grab the two Fairies who are floating around the room, then interact with the pool in the middle. This will summon the Great Fairy, who will then channel her inner Gok Wan and make you more stylish (and powerful) through the powers of accessorizing. 


After her opening words, select “Make me more stylish!” and then you’ll have the option to purchase additional accessory slots. Each slot will cost incrementally more than the previous one, and you’ll need a total of 1,900 Rupees to eventually unlock all five slots:


Number of accessories

articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
Using a controller to play EA FC 25 is highly advisable, but users have encountered certain issues post-launch.


Usually, you can use a wide array of controllers on a PC, including third-party offerings. If you own an Xbox or/and a PS, the controllers that come with them can also be used. Unfortunately, the post-launch scenario has witnessed a few issues arising when players have tried to connect their controllers. Thankfully, there are some easy fixes that will allow you to use your controllers without any issues.


EA FC 25 PC controller error fixes


Problems with controllers are usually caused by the Steam input. This mechanism usually makes it easy for you to use any controller with a PC. Unfortunately, some conflicting issues arise with EA FC 25 on PC. I encountered the same trouble last year, and here are some of the fixes you can try.



Turn off the Steam Input. I did it last year and have done it again. Go to the properties of EA FC 25 and then to controller settings. From here, you can turn off Steam Input.


Close your Steam from the task manager and remove the controller. Connect it once again, and then turn on Steam and the game. This should prevent Steam from connecting to Big Picture by mistake.


Make sure you don't have Keyboard and Mouse selected as input methods. The mouse can sometimes interfere with your controller inputs (keep it in the corner to prevent it from randomly popping up in the middle of the screen).


Go to Device Manager and select USB controller settings. Change the calibration and then reset it to the default settings.



Ultimately, I hope there will be a permanent fix for the controller issues that pop up on PC every year. The first title update didn't include anything in this regard, but a bigger patch is expected now that the game's worldwide launch is over.

The post EA FC 25: How to fix controller not working on PC? appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: EA FC 25: How to fix controller not working on PC?

In NBA 2K25, the answers to 2KTV episodes can be a steady source of some great rewards to help your cause in modes like MyTeam and MyCareer. 


The first episode is still available as of writing, which aired back on Wednesday, September 4. There are 13 questions as part of the first set, and read on to get the correct answers for all of them. But that's not all, as a new episode is expected to be released every week. For now, let's check out the correct answers for all the available questions. 


NBA 2K25 2KTV episode one answers


Here's the complete list of all 13 questions you will come across in the first episode, along with all the answers. 


Question
Answer




NBA 2K25 features our _ season?
11th


What position will you choose for your first build?
Any (2KTV Clothing Item)


Chris…
articles.title: All NBA 2K25 2KTV answers: Episodes 1-4

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
The Zora region is in a state of chaos due to the intense battle between the River and Sea Chief. As the princess of Hyrule, the responsibility falls on you to rescue the helpless residents.


Discover the whereabouts of all Tri's friends in the Stilled Upper Zora River of Zelda Echoes of Wisdom.


All Tri friend locations in Zelda Echoes of Wisdom Chaos at River Zora Village quest


As per Tri's instructions, you'll need to find five of their friends inside the Stilled Upper Zora River. We'll divide each location to help you complete the Chaos at River Zora quest in Zelda Echoes of Wisdom.


Stilled Upper Zora River Tri friend location


Screenshot by Destructoid


At the river entrance, turn right to jump across some floating stone platforms. You'll spot one of the first friend locations…
articles.title: Where to find Tri’s friends in Zelda Echoes of Wisdom Stilled Upper Zora River

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
The Bubble Kelp is one of the most valuable ingredients in Echoes of Wisdom, as it prolongs your breathing underwater. Not only will it benefit your swimming, but it also comes up in a crucial quest for extra rewards.


So, if you aren't sure where to look, here's how to get Bubble Kelp in Zelda Echoes of Wisdom.


Where to find Bubble Kelp in Zelda Echoes of Wisdom


Whether you're on the Out of Bubble Kelp quest or just looking to make some drinks, you have a variety of resourceful ways to obtain Bubble Kelp in Zelda Echoes of Wisdom. Here are a few:


Drops from Sand Crabs at the beach (Zora region)


Screenshot by Destructoid


Discover Sand Crabs at the entrance or the beach side of Jabul Waters. You'll likely enter this region during the Jabul Waters Rift questline, taking you to the…
articles.title: How to get Bubble Kelp in Zelda Echoes of Wisdom

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
As the wave of pirate site blocking spreads globally, some European countries show weakness in their execution. In Germany, for instance, the local blocklist included domains that no longer linked to pirated content, violating the blocking agreement. Tellingly, this only came to the forefront after a 17-year-old developer put together an unofficial transparency portal.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Homebrew Transparency Portal Reveals Needlessly Blocked ‘Pirate’ Sites

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Proponents of Italy's site blocking juggernaut to protect the country's top tier football league have shown their true colors. Proposed amendments to the 'Piracy Shield' law state that, if any network service provider even suspects criminal activity, they must immediately report to the authorities. This includes search engines, DNS and VPN providers, reverse proxy servers, internet security platforms.  Failure to report or even a delay in reporting would be punishable by up to a year in prison.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Will Piracy Kill Football in Italy? Not if Football Damages the Internet First

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Musi, a massively popular free music app with millions of users, has been removed from the App Store. Apple took action following extensive complaints from music industry groups, but whether these complaints directly triggered the app's removal is unclear. Information received by TorrentFreak further reveals that YouTube weighed in as well. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Apple Removes ‘Parasitic’ Streaming App ‘Musi’ Following Persistent Complaints

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
A New York federal court has ordered the operators of shadow library LibGen to pay $30 million in copyright infringement damages. The default judgment comes with a broad injunction that affects third-party services including domain registries, browser extensions, CDN providers, IPFS gateways, advertisers, and more. These parties should stop facilitating access to the pirate site. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: U.S. Court Orders LibGen to Pay $30m to Publishers, Issues Broad Injunction

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
After celebrating a court order that reportedly requires Google to remotely uninstall pirate IPTV app Magis TV from Android devices, LaLiga is far from done. President Javier Tebas has just informed the Europa Forum that LaLiga will file criminal complaints against Google in Spain, France, Brazil, and Ecuador. Tebas accused Google of collaborating with pirates when it could immediately "reduce piracy by 80%" instead. So what does LaLiga actually want?
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: LaLiga Will “File Criminal Complaints Against Google” Over Pirate IPTV

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
The Dutch Supreme Court has requested guidance from the EU's top court on geo-blocking, VPNs, and copyright in a case involving the online publication of Anne Frank's manuscripts. The CJEU's response has the potential to reshape the online content distribution landscape, impacting streaming platforms and other services that rely on geo-blocking. VPNs services will monitor the matter with great interest too. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: “Anne Frank” Copyright Dispute Triggers VPN and Geoblocking Questions at EU’s Highest Court

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
On October 1, 2024, Netflix, Paramount Pictures, Sony Pictures, Universal Studios, Walt Disney Studios, and Warner Bros. Discovery, will welcome Amazon to the most exclusive club in Hollywood; the Motion Picture Association. Prime Video & Amazon MGM Studios, which encompasses Amazon's streaming platform and its film and TV production and distribution division, will become the seventh MPA member and the most recent addition since Netflix joined in 2019.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Amazon Joins the MPA as its Newest Anti-Piracy Member Since Netflix in 2019

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Telegram, an essential communication tool for millions, finds itself under scrutiny once again. Copyright holders have long expressed concerns about the lack of enforcement on the platform, and recent actions suggest Telegram is responding. Subscribers to Z-Library's popular channel recently noticed that several of the shadow library's messages have been removed "due to copyright infringement."
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Telegram Removes Z-Library Posts ‘Due to Copyright Infringement’

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Recent developments in the ongoing battle against pirate IPTV service MagisTV reveal an unprecedented move by an Argentine court. In addition to blocking 69 domains associated with the service, the court has ordered Google to "immediately uninstall" Magis TV apps from Android devices. This measure targets apps that users have sideloaded, as MagisTV is not available on the official Google Play store.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Court Orders Google to “Uninstall” Pirate IPTV App Sideloaded on Android Devices

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Every week we take a close look at the most pirated movies on torrent sites. What are pirates downloading? 'Blink Twice' tops the chart, followed by 'The Crow'. 'Inside Out 2' completes the top three.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Top 10 Most Pirated Movies of The Week – 09/23/2024

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Former piracy giant RARBG closed its doors last year but as is often the case, the brand lives on through knockoff sites. Surprisingly, however, the original RARBG.to domain is back online as well, taking the shape of a shady Thai casino affiliate. This will undoubtedly cause confusion; search engine DuckDuckGo, for example, still identifies RARBG.to as the "official" site.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: RARBG Domain Now Points to a Thai Casino Site

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
In November 2023, the publisher of smash-hit videogame Genshin Impact obtained a DMCA subpoena hoping to identify who was behind the leak of unreleased artwork on Elon Musk's X platform. X Corp. challenged the subpoena, citing the user's anonymous speech rights under the First Amendment. In an order published this week, a district court judge denied X Corps' motion to quash, in theory exposing the alleged leaker's identity to Cognosphere.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: X Loses Battle to Protect Genshin Impact Leaker’s First Amendment Anonymity

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Brazil's Ministry of Justice and Public Security today announced fresh action and the latest achievements in the ongoing 'Operation 404' anti-piracy campaign. International partners including City of London Police, MPA, ACE, IFPI, ESA, ALIANZA, and the EU's Intellectual Property Office, assisted local agencies as they reportedly took down 675 pirate sites, 14 apps, and executed search and seizure warrants. Data seen  by TF reveals that ISP's in Brazil now block 6,700+ domains.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Operation 404.7 Targets 675 Pirate Sites, Brazil’s ISPs Now Block 6,700+ Domains

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Last month, anti-piracy forces celebrated the takedown of Fmovies, the world's largest piracy ring. Motion Picture Association CEO Charles Rivkin boasted that they "took down the mothership". While the victory stands today, not all loose ends were tied up. The domain of Fmovies' hosting platform Vidsrc.to is back online, presumably resurrected by another piracy ring. The Empire Strikes Back? 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Pirate Video Hosting Domain of Fmovies ‘Mothership’ Makes Surprise Comeback

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
There have been many durable pirate sites over the years with The Pirate Bay   perhaps the most high-profile of them all. While it has fewer years under its belt, pirate IPTV service Magis TV is under attack from all sides. The latest broadside in Argentina will see the country's ISPs block around 70 domains, but that's just the tip of the iceberg. The Alliance for Creativity and Entertainment has seized a similar number yet Magis TV has somehow managed to stay afloat.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Magis TV IPTV Crackdown Blocks 70 Domains, Hundreds Already Wiped Out

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
As part of a voluntary agreement with copyright holders, German ISPs block a list of structurally infringing websites. This blocklist has recently expanded with the sports streaming site TotalSportek. The responsible “Clearing Body” concluded that, since efforts to shut down the site or identify its owners failed, site blocking is a reasonable and proportionate measure.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Germany Adds Sports Streaming Site ‘TotalSportek’ to Pirate Site Blocklist

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Several Internet Providers, including Verizon, have asked the U.S. Supreme Court to grant Cox Communications' appeal in a landmark piracy liability case. The ISPs stress that the current ruling creates "extortionate pressure" that puts innocent subscribers at risk. A separate brief from Boston College Law School Professor Alfred Yen, also urges the Supreme Court to take on the case. 
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: ISPs Back Cox’s Supreme Court Petition to Counter “Extortionate” Piracy Liability Pressure

articles.author: Andy Maxwell
articles.description:
Premier League fans searching for an illegal stream of the Spurs v Arsenal match on Sunday may have received an unexpected intervention. As part of the BeStreamWise anti-piracy campaign, would-be pirates on X and Reddit were reportedly gifted a link to a stream, but not of the match. The replacement featured a real stream made entirely of water, protecting the viewer from malware and potentially curing them of piracy forever. For those who missed out, there are other things to try.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Fake Streams ‘Save’ Premier League Pirates, Security Tips Can Save More

articles.author: Ernesto Van der Sar
articles.description:
Earlier this year, a Hawaiian district court blocked movie companies' efforts to unmask alleged BitTorrent pirates using a DMCA subpoena 'shortcut'. The filmmakers requested the court to reconsider its position, but without success. Undeterred, the filmmakers are now petitioning the Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit to review the lower court's findings.
From: TF, for the latest news on copyright battles, piracy and more.
articles.title: Movie Companies Take DMCA Subpoena ‘Shortcut’ Dispute to Court of Appeals

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Výtvarně nádherné, ale jinak... Jako kdyby si v DreamWorks řekli "VALL-I, Železný obr a Laputa byly fajn, ale moc sofistikované. Pojďme natočit něco pro NORMÁLNÍ děti!" A to je škoda, protože tenhle film si klade potenciálně velmi zajímavé otázky, ale většinu z nich ignoruje na úkor roztomilých zvířátek a ujetého robota. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Rozzum v divočině [The Wild Robot] - 70 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Film má docela originální námět, ze kterého by mohlo vzniknout něco opravdu unikátního, kdyby měl lepší scénář, lepšího režiséra a lepší herce. Takhle je to 10 zajímavých minut na začátku, pak hodina nudy a pak 30 minut WTF, ve kterých už není možné nijak soucítit s nikým na plátně a bylo mi srdečně jedno, co se vlastně "doopravdy" stalo. (Ilča 50 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Nikdy se nepouštěj! [Never Let Go] - 40 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: 110 minut docela kvalitního retra, které připomíná spíše "Po strništi bos" než cokoliv od Bohdana Slámy, a pak 20 minut něčeho zcela jiného, co je buď vrcholně originální nebo vrcholně nevydařené, ale v každém případě to pramálo navazuje na 110 předchozích minut. Znovu se ukazuje, že Sláma bravurně zvládá drobné situace, ale má problémy s dvouhodinovým, někam směřujícím dějem. Krobot je jako obvykle úžasný. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Konec světa - 60 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Skoro dokonalý horor. Nepředvídatelný, ale přesto celkem logický děj. Hutná atmosféra, tvořená novými permutacemi starých klišé, bez nutnosti uchylovat se k lekačkám a stříkající krvi. Nepotřebuji to vidět znovu, ale dlouho jsem něco tak kvalitního neviděl a nevšiml jsem si mnoha věcí, které by se daly zlepšit. (Ilča 80 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Duše prokletých [Oddity] - 90 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Velmi příjemné překvapení. Dobře napsané i zahrané scény mezi lidmi, kterým poněkud nefunguje komunikace a navzájem si připadají "trochu divní". Fungovalo by to dobře jako normální (nehororové) současné drama. Ke konci se to trochu zvrhne do standardní vyvražďovačky, ale pořád výrazný nadprůměr s několika výbornými scenáristickými nápady. Neviděl jsem dánský originál. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Nepřivolávej nic zlého [Speak no Evil] (2024) - 80 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Tento post není o filmu, nýbrž o mé oblíbené videohře Factorio, která chystá cosi velkého...
articles.title: A co budete vy hrát 21. října?

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Čtyři lidoopové chodí přírodou, hýkají, a stane se jim pět nebo šest věcí, které stojí za zmínku. Potenciálně dojemná patnáctiminutová hříčka, která byla zcela nesmyslně natažena na 90 minut, následkem čehož se její rozvleklost téměř nedá fyzicky vydržet. (Ilča 5 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Chlupatá rodinka [Sasquatch Sunset] - 40 %

articles.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
articles.description: Po svěžích "Chudáčcích" je tohle návrat k intelektuální artovosti "Humra" nebo "Posvátného jelena". Výborní herci, výborná atmosféra jednotlivých scén, ale velmi brzy jsem se přestal snažit chápat, co si z toho mám vlastně odnést. Mírným pozitivem je, že to jsou tři oddělené minipříběhy (se stejnými herci) a ne jeden dlouhý. (Ilča 60 %)
articles.title: Audio recenze: Milé laskavosti [Kinds of Kindness] - 60 %
